publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-123# Mr Adam Ingram: Seroxat—That the Parliament notes the recommendations by the Committee on the Safety of Medicines regarding the prescribing of seroxat to those aged under 18, which have called for this drug not to be prescribed to those suffering from depression, and notes that seroxat is not licensed for use by under-18s and has been reportedly the cause of high levels of self-harm and suicidal behaviour.

S2M-123# Seroxat (lodged on 10 June 2003) Campbell Martin*, Christine Grahame*, Robin Harper*, Michael Matheson*, Carolyn Leckie*, Brian Adam*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mike Pringle*, Frances Curran*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Alex Neil*
S2M-123# Seroxat (lodged on 10 June 2003) Mr David Davidson*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Fergusson*, John Swinburne*
